<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">首先两万的月薪在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">BAT</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">实在太普遍了</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:
0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">一般是高级工程师和资深工程师的职位</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">在阿里是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">p6~p7</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:
0pt">左右</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">在百度是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">t5</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">左右</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">腾讯是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">t2-3</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">左右</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">京东是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">t3-1</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">美团是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">p6</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">左右</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">其他的我不了解</span><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">这种级别是他们主要码农层级</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">加班多</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">能解决大部分问题</span><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">但对系统的整体架构能力和深入分析瓶颈的能力还需要培养</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
